login.informative-text: If you are not accredited by an organization as an independent observer, you cannot use Vote Monitor app. Please refer to Vot Corect to learn what steps you need to take to become an electoral observer.
login.title: Log in
login.paragraph: Please use the email address with which you registered as an independent observer:

errors.credentials: There was a problem with your credentials. Please try again.
errors.general: Error while trying to log in

reset.title: Forgot your password?
reset.paragraph: Please enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a verification code.

county.title: Select the [Location - L2] of the polling station

municipality.title: Select the [Location - L3] of the polling station

street.title: Select the [Street] of the polling station

number.title: Select the [Number] of the polling station

observations.title: My polling stations
observations.paragraph: You can switch between polling stations if you want to revisit form answers or polling stations information.

add_note.title: Add a note
add_note.placeholder: Add any relevant notes to this question.

select_option.no_data: No data found for current search.

language_modal.helper: The selected form is available in multiple languages. Please select which one you would like to continue with.
language_modal.error: Please select one of the options

inbox_empty.title: No message received yet
inbox_empty.paragraph: Push messages and alerts from your organization will appear here.

guides_empty.title: No guides to read yet
guides_empty.paragraph: Guides and resources from your organization at your hands.

new_password.label: New password *
new_password.pattern: Password should have at least one uppercase character, one number, one special character and to be minimum 8 character long without spaces

success_page.title: Password changed!
success_page.paragraph: Your password has been successfully changed.

email_confirmation.title: Email sent
email_confirmation.paragraph: Check your email and open the link we sent to continue. Check your spam filter if you did not receive the email.

error.arrival_first: Please select an arrival time first.
error.later_departure: Please select a departure time that is at a later time than the arrival.
error.earlier_arrival: Please select an arrival time that is at an earlier time than the departure.

polling_station_card.title: Answer a few quick questions about the polling station.

observations_empty.title: No visited polling stations yet
observations_empty.paragraph: Start configuring your first polling station before completing observation forms.

question_page.min: The field must be at least {{value}} characters long
question_page.max: The field must have a maximum of {{value}} characters
